name: UICloudSharingControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol you implement to provide additional information to, and receive notifications from, the CloudKit sharing controller.

items.name: func itemTitle(for: UICloudSharingController) -> String?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the title to display on the invitation screen.

items.name: func itemType(for: UICloudSharingController) -> String?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the Uniform Type Identifier (UTI) of the item.

items.name: func itemThumbnailData(for: UICloudSharingController) -> Data?
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the thumbnail image data to display on the invitation.

items.name: func cloudSharingController(UICloudSharingController, failedToSaveShareWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller failed to save the share record.

items.name: func cloudSharingControllerDidStopSharing(UICloudSharingController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has stopped sharing the record.

items.name: func cloudSharingControllerDidSaveShare(UICloudSharingController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the CloudKit sharing controller saved the share record.
